content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""

The website I was directed to was https://www.cryptodatadownload.com/data/. I was asked to find the link to download the file. No new developments have occurred.'}

[{'role': 'your computer', 'content': 'Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: The text does not provide a specific link to download "cryptocurrency_data.csv." However, historical data can be downloaded in a standardized CSV format for free without the need to register, with some granularities requiring a free account. The data includes various types of cryptocurrency data organized by exchange, symbol, and timeframe. \n \n Links: [\'USA (https://www.cryptodatadownload.com/)\', \' (callto:#)\', \'support@cryptodatadownload.com  (mailto:support@cryptodatadownload.com)\', \' (https://facebook.com/cryptodatadownload/)\', \' (https://twitter.com/cryptodatadl)\']'}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "execute_shell", "args": {"command_line": "wget https://www.cryptodatadownload.com/cdd/Bitfinex_BTCUSD_d.csv -O cryptocurrency_data.csv"}}}'}]
